ch0352_00_taro/0101_0701_02_10:
Aren’t you excited just thinking about what cute
things we’ll discover today? Let’s go see!
ch0352_00_taro/7101_0701_01_10: Everyone has their own definition of “cute”...
ch0352_00_taro/7101_0701_02_10:
but for me, it can include small things, big things,
scraggy, fluffy... Just about anything!
ch0352_00_taro/7101_0701_03_10: If you find something cute, be sure to share it!
ch0352_00_taro/7102_0701_01_10:
At Blueberry Academy, we’ve got this thing called
the Terarium.
ch0352_00_taro/7102_0701_02_10:
It has different environments for Pokémon to
live in.
ch0352_00_taro/7102_0701_03_10:
Pasio may not have wild Pokémon, but it does
have an artificial environment.
ch0352_00_taro/7102_0701_04_10: So I guess it’s kind of similar!
ch0352_00_taro/7103_0701_01_10:
If there’s a school subject you struggle with,
you can start improving by overcoming your
negative feelings toward it!
ch0352_00_taro/7103_0701_02_10:
I’d be happy to come up with some fun quiz
questions for you!
ch0352_00_taro/7104_0701_01_10:
I was one of the Elite Four in Blueberry Academy’s
League Club.
ch0352_00_taro/7104_0701_02_10:
But that title pales in comparison to Pasio’s
powerhouse Trainers!
ch0352_00_taro/7104_0701_03_10:
Everyone here is so incredible, I can’t even
imagine choosing an Elite Four for Pasio!
ch0352_00_taro/7105_0701_01_10:
You seem really nice, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
And you’re proactive! That’s a good quality in
a person!
ch0352_00_taro/7105_0701_02_10:
I know someone who could learn a thing or two
from you.
ch0352_00_taro/1701_0701_01_10: Here, I’ve some items to share with you!
ch0352_00_taro/1701_0702_01_10:
Cuteness—AND items—should be shared with
everyone!
ch0352_00_taro/2501_0701_01_10: My daddy’s actually a Gym Leader in Unova.
ch0352_00_taro/2501_0701_02_10:
Ever since I was little, he’s taught me what’s right
and wrong—and what it means to be strong.
ch0352_00_taro/2501_0701_03_10: But he’s never told me what to do.
ch0352_00_taro/2501_0701_04_10: Because Daddy is Daddy, and I’m my own person!
ch0352_00_taro/2501_0702_01_10:
Daddy’s here on Pasio too, so we might run into
him sometime.
ch0352_00_taro/2501_0702_02_10: If we do, I’ll give you a formal introduction!
ch0352_00_taro/2511_0701_01_10:
I think it’s good to take a stance and call out
things that aren’t right.
ch0352_00_taro/2511_0701_02_10:
But there’s no guarantee our words will get
through.
ch0352_00_taro/2511_0701_03_10:
If we REALLY feel something’s wrong, then we
need to act accordingly and do something to
stop it.
ch0352_00_taro/2511_0702_01_10:
If I’m ever doing something wrong, don’t hesitate
to tell me, OK?
ch0352_00_taro/2511_0702_02_10: Because we often don’t notice our own mistakes!
ch0352_00_taro/3001_0701_01_10:
Let’s get our morning preparation done in a jiffy
and go on a fun outing!
ch0352_00_taro/3003_0701_01_10:
The warm sunlight is so nice! Try using a
Pokémon’s tummy as a pillow for a nap!
ch0352_00_taro/3005_0701_01_10:
If today’s worn you out, let’s soothe those tired
feelings away by sharing some cuteness around.
